title: My Former Student Controlled My Life for 24 Hours (He's Missing Part of His Brain)

media:group.media:title: My Former Student Controlled My Life for 24 Hours (He's Missing Part of His Brain)
media:group.media:description:
Subscribe to Kevin's World at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeXkJqMp03XFI89iZNdK1nA

Kevin was born without his corpus callosum, the part of the brain that connects the two hemispheres. He is also my former student and the first participant of the SBSK Mentorship program. As part of this program I am teaching him how to create content. I promised Kev that if he reached 10,000 subscribers he could control my life for 24 hours. Kevin quickly passed this milestone and made it his goal to make me as "uncomfortable as possible" for a full day. This is what followed.

Support SBSK at https://www.patreon.com/SBSK
